TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but its mass is equivalent to a small black hole and can not be approached or you will be spaghettified and thus you can never read it.

 

I wish for a real trip to outer space

Edited June 12, 2021 by Dientus
llok ewn agep

Granted. You trip out the window of a 60 story building and have plenty of space on the way down.

I wish for the wish of the first person who wished on here.

Granted, but the because the world is flat* you get a giant hamster rug.

I wish I was out of the Nether in Minecraft.

Edited June 12, 2021 by Admiral Fluffy
*it’s not

Granted. You fell in lava and respawned having lost everything you worked up to.

I wish I could fly up in to the orbit of the Minecraft world and see all the biomes below me.

Granted, but the world is only one biome.

I wish I had some cake.

You get the ability, but then your computer immediately extends out legs and jumps out the window.

I want a crane.

Granted. Enjoy your sandhill crane.

I wish for some cake

Granted but you drop it and a panda runs up and eats it.

 

I wish for the worlds largest trampoline at the bottom of the 60 story building......

Sure, each story is 3 centimeters tall, as it is a 1:100 scale building.

I wish for a crawler crane.

Granted. It is summon directly above you and crushes you.

I wish for a fully functional 737ng flight simulator.

Granted. You fly your house around using it but then severe wind shear makes you lose control and smash your house and all it's contents in to the ground.

I wish that KSP2 will have a well detailed and populated undersea world in it.
(Joined to the previous wisher wish).

Granted, you drown while enjoying the view.

I wish for a crawler crane spawned on the ground.

Edited June 12, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman

Granted. Unfortunately it is upside down and would require one of those giant mine excavators (the type you can drive a mine truck into the bucket of) to right it.

I wish my KSP Kerbal to be using Angel-125's S.C.U.B.A gear and not drown while enjoying the view.
granted, but they get eaten by a shark
No wish?

lul, i forgot.

i iwsh for a car

Granted. 1 matchbox car.

I wish that when a Shark is coming in KSP2, you hear the theme from JAWS!

Edited June 12, 2021 by ColdJ

granted, but the shark size is 0.000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001 mm and u cant see it but a kerbal can be killed if touching them

i wish for a truck

Granted. One railway bogie, also known as a truck.

I wish for a KSP model of Captain Nemo's Nautilus Submarine, Not too big, not to small, but just the right size. And fully functional.

granted, but the crew forgot to close the hatch and  waters come insinde.

 i wish for an Axolotl

Granted. But you forgot to put it in water and it shrunk into an AxoLittle.

I wish for a stong bilge pump to get all the water out of the inside of my lovely new sub.

Edited June 12, 2021 by ColdJ

Granted. But while you are pumping the water from inside, it still flows from outside, so the pump has sunken, too.

I wish for the mentioned sharks in KSP.

Granted.

But they become kerbalized and create a "sharknado" that not only destroys the VAB, but also attacks aircraft that try to leave the field.

 

I wish for a preview on how to mod KSP2

Not granted. In KSP2 the game is modding the modder.

Yes, I wish a Kerbal Sharknado, too. Tara Kerman is also appreciated.
